'Shuri...are you okay?'%K%P
She sat with her head down,\nso I tapped her on the shoulder.%K%P
'Yamato...'%K%P
She turned around, seemingly\nready to burst into tears.%K%P
'You sure don't look okay.'%K%P
'Of course I'm not, I mean...'%K%P
I guess even goddesses can get worked up.%K%P
At least, these two sure could.%K%P
'Wanna talk about it?'%K%P
'Yeah...'%K%P
'Hey! Wait! \nWhat's the big idea?'%K%P
'Come on, just follow me for a bit here.'%K%P
I dragged her with me down to Akihabara.%K%P
We walked past all the buildings in front of the\nstation until we finally got to the spot.%K%P
'This is...'%K%P
'You know, right? \nThis is where they hold the main event.'%K%P
It was an event stage in Akihabara. \nThis is where the main audition would be held.%K%P
The preliminaries are all online, so this stage\nwouldn't get used until the results were announced\ntomorrow.%K%P
'Look, lots of other Divine Idols are here.'%K%P
'You're right...'%K%P
All the other contestants had gathered at this\nalmost sacred place, all with the same thing\non their minds.%K%P
Some of them were close contenders with Love☆Kami,\nsome of them were those who already knew\nthey wouldn't make it.%K%P
They were all waiting out those final moments.%K%P
'We should have brought Kagura out here, too.'%K%P
She looked at me with that\n'why me?' look in her eyes.%K%P
'Yeah, you're right. Why didn't we?'%K%P
I knew why.%K%P
It's because she just looked so helpless.%K%P
'I guess Kagura is gonna be\nmy rival too, from now on.'%K%P
Even members of the same duo\nwould get pitted against each other in the finals.%K%P
Shuri was already looking ahead of the preliminaries.%K%P
'I'm definitely gonna make it into L☆SEVEN.'%K%P
She didn't seem to be as worried as before.%K%P
'Once I make it in, I'm sure, just sure,\nthat my sis will notice me. \nThat's the whole reason I entered this thing.'%K%P
'Your sister is Bishamonten? \nYou two don't get along?'%K%P
'No, we do. We're really close, actually.'%K%P
She smiled ever so brightly. \nIt was a smile like none I had ever seen before.%K%P
'But when she joined up with L☆SEVEN\nshe moved out. She lives on her own, now.'%K%P
'She's just so wonderful,\nand unlike me she's always moving forward, you know?'%K%P
'I'm sure she's never planning to come back. \nThat's why I decided to stop waiting.\nI'm gonna go after her, instead.'%K%P
'If I can make it into L☆SEVEN,\nI'll get to be with her again. \nI'm done with being left behind.'%K%P
'You're probably really disappointed in me, huh?\nFor doing all this for such selfish reasons.'%K%P
She smiled through her words.%K%P
It was so bittersweet, I thought I might tear up.%K%P
'I'm sorry that I made you work so hard for me.'%K%P
'You don't need to apologize.'%K%P
This sort of fake smile,\nthis wasn't the Shuri I knew.%K%P
'Stop apologizing...\nAnd stop looking at me like that.'%K%P
'But...'%K%P
'Who cares what your reasons are? \nYou still showed me the way. \nDoes the rest really matter?'%K%P
'You're always so dazzling when you're singing. \nThat's what drew me in.'%K%P
I had never been interested in Divine Idols.%K%P
However, when I first saw Shuri,\nI was instantly drawn to her.%K%P
'Are you sure? You don't hate me for it?'%K%P
'Who ever said there was anything wrong with\nwanting to be an idol with your sister?'%K%P
'You always looked up to your sister, right?\nYou wanted to grow up to be just like her, right?'%K%P
'It shows through, you know. \nThat's why everyone is out there voting for you.'%K%P
'Right?'%K%P
'Yeah... Yeah, I guess you're right.'%K%P
'What am I doing getting all gloomy like this? \nIt's not really like me, huh?'%K%P
She was finally back to her normal self.%K%P
There was nothing left to be afraid of.%K%P
'I believe in you and your dream, Shuri. \nAnd I want to see it come true.'%K%P
'As long as you're with me, I feel like it will.'%K%P
'Yeah, leave it to me!'%K%P
'I will. So keep up the good work, yeah?'%K%P
We took each other's hands\nand firmly shook in agreement.%K%P
Even when the auditions were over,\nShuri and I would still have our bond.%K%P
This handshake was a sign of that agreement.%K%P
